title: Matsumoto
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription and Seal

left mar LRC: [ 遠志 ] {Tōshi}; LLC in bottom margin, in grey
description: ducks on shore and swimming in water in foreground; four children and adult with baby on back on a path in front of white and grey buildings in middle ground; mountain peak, ULQ
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
